mainText:
To Mr Jobs family and friends,

Like many, I was saddened tonight to learn about the death of Steve 
Jobs. We lost someone who revolutionized the world as we, or at least I, know 
it. My first computer was a Mac Classic, that I still own to that day. 
Not only the products created by Apple but the vision of this man and 
the company he built shaped so many of the things we use on a day to day 
basis. People using Apple products learned to "Think Different" and I 
try to do that everyday. I'm glad I got to live during a time where I 
could see the body of his work and vision come to life. My thoughts are with his family and all those who feel saddened by his 
death.
author: David
